1: Nak ac xeßcam nabaleb laj Israel xban li caki yajel, li Kâcuaß Dios quixye reheb laj Moisés ut laj Eleazar li ralal laj Aarón laj tij:
2: —Têrajlaheb chixjunileb li ralal xcßajol laj Israel saß li junjûnk cabal li ac xeßxbânu junmay chihab, joß eb ajcuiß li ac numenak junmay chihab, li târûk teßoc chokß soldado, chan.
3: Laj Moisés ut laj Eleazar laj tij queßâtinac riqßuineb laj Israel saß li cßalebâl re Moab, li cuan nachß riqßuin li nimaß Jordán. Li naßajej aßan cuan saß xcaßyabâl li tenamit Jericó. Ut queßxye reheb:
4: —Têrajlaheb chixjunileb li cuînk li ac xeßxbânu junmay chihab, joß eb ajcuiß li numenak junmay chihab joß quixye li Dios re laj Moisés, chanqueb. Li teßajlâk, aßaneb li queßisîc chak Egipto.
5: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Rubén, li xbên ralal laj Israel: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Enoc; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Falú;
6: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hezrón; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Carmi.
7: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Rubén. Oxib roxcßâl mil riqßuin cuukub ciento riqßuin lajêb xcaßcßâl chixjunileb.
8: Li ralal laj Falú, aßan laj Eliab.
9: Eb li ralal laj Eliab, aßaneb laj Nemuel, laj Datán, ut laj Abiram. Laj Datán ut laj Abiram, aßaneb li queßqßuehoc xnaßlebeb laj Israel. Queßxkßetkßeti ribeb chiruheb laj Moisés ut laj Aarón rochbeneb laj Coré ut eb li queßoquen chirix nak queßxcuechßi rix li Kâcuaß.
10: Li chßochß quijacheß ut queßtßaneß chi saß laj Coré ut eb li queßoquen chirix. Cuib ciento riqßuin lajêb roxcßâl queßsacheß ru saß li xam. Li cßaßru queßxcßul eb aßan, aßan quicßanjelac re teßoc xcßaßuxeb laj Israel.
11: Abanan incßaß queßosoß chi junaj cua eb li ralal xcßajol laj Coré.
12: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Simeón: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Nemuel; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jamín; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jaquín;
13: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Zera; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Saúl.
14: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Simeón. Cuib xcaßcßâl mil riqßuin cuib ciento chixjunileb.
15: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Gad: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Zefón; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hagui; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Suni;
16: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Ozni; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Eri;
17: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Arod; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Areli.
18: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Gad. Caßcßâl mil riqßuin ôb ciento chixjunileb.
19: Laj Er ut laj Onán, aßaneb li ralal xcßajol laj Judá li queßcam saß li naßajej Canaán.
20: Eb li ralal xcßajol laj Judá, aßaneb aßin: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Sela; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Fares; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Zera.
21: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Fares: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hezrón ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hamul.
22: Aßaneb li ralal xcßajol laj Judá. Cuaklaju xcâcßâl mil riqßuin ôb ciento chixjunileb.
23: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Isacar: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Tola; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Fúa;
24: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jasub; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Simrón.
25: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Isacar. Câhib xcâcßâl mil riqßuin oxib ciento chixjunileb.
26: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Zabulón: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Sered; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Elón; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jahleel.
27: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Zabulón. Oxcßâl mil riqßuin ôb ciento chixjunileb.
28: Eb li ralal xcßajol laj José, aßaneb laj Manasés ut laj Efraín.
29: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Manasés: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Maquir; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Galaad.
30: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Galaad: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jezer; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Helec;
31: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Asriel; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Siquem;
32: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Semida; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hefer.
33: Incßaß queßcuan ralal laj Zelofehad li ralal laj Hefer. Caßaj cuiß xrabin queßcuan. Aßaneb aßin lix cßabaßeb: lix Maala, lix Noa, lix Hogla, lix Milca, ut lix Tirsa.
34: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Manasés. Cablaju roxcßâl mil riqßuin cuukub ciento chixjunileb.
35: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Efraín: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Sutela; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Bequer; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Tahán.
36: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Sutela: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Erán.
37: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Efraín. Cablaju xcaßcßâl mil riqßuin ôb ciento chixjunileb. Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj José, aß yal chanru xqßuialeb saß li junjûnk cabal.
38: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Benjamín: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Bela; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Asbel; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Ahiram;
39: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Sufam; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hufam.
40: Eb li ralal xcßajol laj Bela, aßaneb laj Ard ut laj Naamán, ut eb li ralal xcßajol eb aßan.
41: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Benjamín. Oßlaju roxcßâl mil riqßuin cuakib ciento chixjunileb.
42: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Dan: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Súham. Aßaneb li ralal xcßajol laj Dan.
43: Eb li ralal xcßajol laj Dan li queßcuan riqßuin laj Súham, aßan câhib xcâcßâl mil riqßuin câhib ciento chixjunileb.
44: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Aser: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Imna; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Isúi; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Bería.
45: Eb li ralal xcßajol laj Bería, aßaneb li ralal xcßajol laj Heber ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Malquiel.
46: Laj Aser quicuan jun lix rabin xSera xcßabaß.
47: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Aser. Oxlaju roxcßâl mil riqßuin câhib ciento chixjunileb.
48: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Neftalí: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jahzeel; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Guni;
49: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Jezer; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Silem.
50: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Neftalí. Ôb roxcßâl mil riqßuin câhib ciento chixjunileb.
51: Cuakib ciento mil riqßuin jun mil riqßuin cuukub ciento riqßuin lajêb xcaßcßâl chixjunileb li cuînk aj Israel li ac queßxbânu junmay chihab.
52: Li Kâcuaß quiâtinac riqßuin laj Moisés ut quixye re:
53: —Aßaneb li teßjeqßuîk xchßochßeb aß yal joß qßuialeb li tzßîbanbil xcßabaßeb.
54: Cui nabaleb, nim li naßajej li tâqßuehekß reheb. Cui ut incßaß nabaleb, incßaß ajcuiß nabal li chßochß teßxcßul. Tâjeqßui li chßochß aß yal joß qßuialeb saß li junjûnk chßûtal.
55: Nak têjeqßui li chßochß aßin saß xyânk li junjûnk chßûtal, têjeqßui riqßuin bûlic ut aß yal chanru tzßîbanbil xcßabaßeb li junjûnk têp.
56: Têjeqßui li chßochß aßin riqßuin bûlic. Li nabaleb, nabal têqßue reheb. Ut li incßaß qßuiheb, incßaß ajcuiß qßui têqßue reheb.
57: Aßaneb aßin li ralal xcßajol laj Leví li queßajlâc: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Gersón; eb li ralal xcßajol laj Coat; ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Merari.
58: Aßaneb aßin li jun chßol chic li ralal xcßajol laj Leví: eb li ralal xcßajol laj Libni, eb li ralal xcßajol laj Hebrón, eb li ralal xcßajol laj Mahli, eb li ralal xcßajol laj Musi, ut eb li ralal xcßajol laj Coré. Laj Coat, aßan lix yucuaß laj Amram.
59: Laj Amram quisumla riqßuin lix Jocabed, jun ixk xcomoneb li ralal xcßajol laj Leví. Quiyoßla nak cuanqueb aran Egipto. Lix cocßal laj Amram li queßcuan riqßuin lix Jocabed, aßaneb laj Aarón, laj Moisés ut lix María.
60: Ut eb li ralal laj Aarón, aßaneb laj Nadab, laj Abiú, laj Eleazar ut laj Itamar.
61: Laj Nadab ut laj Abiú queßcam nak queßxqßue li xam saß li sansar li incßaß xye li Dios.
62: Nak queßajlâc chixjunileb li cuînk aj Leví quiticla riqßuineb li cuan jun po reheb. Ut queßajlâc ajcuiß li nînkeb. Jalan nak quitzßîbâc xcßabaßeb xban nak incßaß queßqßueheß xchßochßeb. Oxib xcaßcßâl mil chixjunileb li cuînk aj levita.
63: Aßaneb chixjunileb li queßajlâc xban laj Moisés ut laj Eleazar laj tij nak queßajlâc chixjunileb laj Israel saß li ru takßa re Moab li cuan chire li nimaß Jordán. Li naßajej aßan cuan saß xcaßyabâl li tenamit Jericó.
64: Mâ jun saß xyânkeb aßin li queßajlâc xban laj Moisés ut laj Aarón nak cuanqueb chak saß li chaki chßochß Sinaí.Mâ jun li queßajlâc junxil cuan saß xyânkeb xban nak li Kâcuaß quixye nak teßcâmk saß li chaki chßochß. Caßaj cuiß laj Caleb li ralal laj Jefone, ut laj Josué li ralal laj Nun queßcana chi yoßyo.
65: Mâ jun li queßajlâc junxil cuan saß xyânkeb xban nak li Kâcuaß quixye nak teßcâmk saß li chaki chßochß. Caßaj cuiß laj Caleb li ralal laj Jefone, ut laj Josué li ralal laj Nun queßcana chi yoßyo.
